Package it.zanifabio.rover

Class Rover

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.zanifabio.rover.Rover
  • public class Rover
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a specific rover on a planet and how to move it around. The rover can have a unique planet and in each moment has a given position on the planet and a given facing direction.

    • Method Detail

      • newInstance

        public static Rover newInstance​(Planet planet,
                                Coordinate initialPosition,
                                Direction initialFacingDirection)
        Static factory method to generate a new instance of a rover. The rover must be placed inside the boundaries of the planet and not on any obstacle.
        Parameters:
        planet - it.zanifabio.rover.Planet where the rover operates.
        initialPosition - Initial position of the rover on the planet. Must be inside the planet and not on obstacles.
        initialFacingDirection - Initial direction the rover is facing (N,E,S,W).
        Returns:
        A new instance of the rover.
        Throws:
        Planet.PlanetPhysicsException - If the rover initial position is outside the planet or on an obstacle.

      • move

        public void move​(Action action)
        Method to move the rover on the planet given an action to perform.
        Parameters:
        action - The action the rover must perform. It has to be one of: FORWARD, BACKWARDS, LEFT, RIGHT
        Throws:
        ObstacleEncounteredException - Exception indicating an obstacle was encountered, its position and the status of the rover.

      • move

        public void move​(char[] sequence)
        Method to input the rover a sequence of actions it should perform. In case of exceptions (obstacle encountered or illegal command) it moves until the sequence is valid and then aborts the sequence.
        Parameters:
        sequence - Character sequence representing the sequence of commands the rover should perform.
        Throws:
        ObstacleEncounteredException - Exception indicating an obstacle was encountered, its position and the status of the rover.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Exception indicating an illegal command was given in the sequence.

      • move

        public void move​(java.lang.String sequence)
        Method to input the rover a sequence of actions it should perform. In case of exceptions (obstacle encountered or illegal command) it moves until the sequence is valid and then aborts the sequence.
        Parameters:
        sequence - String representing the sequence of commands the rover should perform.
        Throws:
        ObstacleEncounteredException - Exception indicating an obstacle was encountered, its position and the status of the rover.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Exception indicating an illegal command was given in the sequence.

      • getStringMatrixRepresentation

        protected java.lang.String[][] getStringMatrixRepresentation()
        Returns a string matrix containing a representation of the rover on the planet.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Representation of the rover on the planet. Points are free spaces, squares are obstacles and the rover is represented as an arrow pointing in the direction it is facing.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        String representation of the planet.

        public Planet getPlanet()
